channel.title: Project Annihilation problem with running
channel.description:
Hey, why the hell I get this error when I'm trying to run it ?
[code]SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: d:\npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml (The device is not ready) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition.init(NPCDefinition.java:107) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$4.call(World.java:140) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Could someone say where the problem is ? :/

item.title: Project Annihilation problem with running
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Navigate to

package org.hyperion.rs2.model.NPCDefinition;

and find

d:/npcDefinitionsEPICSHIT1337.xml

and change it to

data/npcDefinitions.xml

Successful anti-leech was successful.

Read full topic
